        Parameters:
        sw - the added switch

      • handleMessage

        void handleMessage(IOFSwitchBackend sw,
                   org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m,
                   FloodlightContext bContext)
        Relays an upstream message to the controller to dispatch to listeners.
        Parameters:
        sw - The switch the message was received on.
        m - The message received.
        bContext - the Floodlight context of the message, normally null in this case.

      • handleOutgoingMessage

                           org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage m)
        Process written messages through the message listeners for the controller
        Parameters:
        sw - The switch being written to
        m - the message

      • getSwitchHandshakeHandlers

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableList<OFSwitchHandshakeHandler> getSwitchHandshakeHandlers()
        Gets an unmodifiable collection of OFSwitchHandshakeHandlers
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable collection of OFSwitchHandshakeHandlers

      • addOFSwitchDriver

        void addOFSwitchDriver(java.lang.String manufacturerDescriptionPrefix,
                       IOFSwitchDriver driver)
        Adds an OFSwitch driver
        Parameters:
        manufacturerDescriptionPrefix - Register the given prefix with the driver.
        driver - A IOFSwitchDriver instance to handle IOFSwitch instantiation for the given manufacturer description prefix
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the the manufacturer description is already registered
        NullPointerExeption - if manufacturerDescriptionPrefix is null
        NullPointerExeption - if driver is null

      • switchStatusChanged

        void switchStatusChanged(IOFSwitchBackend sw,
                         IOFSwitch.SwitchStatus oldStatus,
                         IOFSwitch.SwitchStatus newStatus)
        Handles all changes to the switch status. Will alert listeners and manage the internal switch map appropriately.
        Parameters:
        sw - the switch that has changed
        oldStatus - the switch's old status
        newStatus - the switch's new status

      • getNumRequiredConnections

        int getNumRequiredConnections()
        Gets the number of connections required by the application
        Returns:
        the number of connections required by the applications

      • addSwitchEvent

        void addSwitchEvent(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.DatapathId switchDpid,
                    java.lang.String reason,
                    boolean flushNow)
        Record a switch event in in-memory debug-event
        Parameters:
        switchDpid -
        reason - Reason for this event
        flushNow - see debug-event flushing in IDebugEventService

      • getHandshakePlugins

        java.util.List<IAppHandshakePluginFactory> getHandshakePlugins()
        Get the list of handshake plugins necessary for the switch handshake.
        Returns:
        the list of handshake plugins registered by applications.

        Get the switch manager's counters
        Returns:
        the switch manager's counters

        boolean isCategoryRegistered(LogicalOFMessageCategory category)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
